scripts.start:devex: docker start devex || docker run --name devex -d -p 5557:80 zilliqa/devex:latest; docker cp ./devex/networks.json devex:/usr/share/nginx/html/networks.json
scripts.start:isolatedserver: docker start isolatedserver || docker run -d -p 5555:5555 --name isolatedserver zilliqa/zilliqa-isolated-server
